name: Cook the Book: Crabmeat, Corn and Cumin Salad in Endive Spears
description: Whole endive leaves make beautiful, edible canape cups, and come into peak season just in time for the holidays. In this week's Cook the Book selection, The Bon Appétit Fast Easy Fresh Cookbook, the leaves are filled with a cumin-flavored...
recipeIngredient: 6 ounces fresh lump crabmeat, picked over, well drained
1/2 cup frozen corn kernels, thawed, drained
4 teaspoons mixed chopped fresh herbs (such as tarragon and parsley)
2 heads Belgian endive, separated into spears

recipeInstructions.text: Mix first 10 ingredients in medium bowl. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Cover and chill at least 4 hours and up to 1 day.
Drain salad and place 1 rounded tablespoon in base end of each endive spear. Arrange on platters and serve.
